hanzi-su-wiki:
傾

Значения

Наклоняться, быть склонным к чему-либо; приходить в упадок, гибнуть

Мнемоника

Молить 匕 судью в надежде, что тот склонит голову 頁 в знак прощения простолюдина 亻.

Варианты

倾
purpleculture_pinyin:
qīng
to overturn; to collapse; to lean; to tend; to incline; to pour out
переворачивать; свернуть; наклоняться; ухаживать; наклонять; вылить

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 倾)
Pictophonetic: 頃 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
傾向 [ qīng xiàng ]: trend; tendency; orientation
傾銷 [ qīng xiāo ]: to dump (goods, products)
傾聽 [ qīng tīng ]: to listen attentively
傾斜 [ qīng xié ]: to incline; to lean; to slant; to slope; to tilt

    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people

heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T practices the correct incline the spoon needs to be held at so that nothing spills while it's on its way towards his head. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: lean, change, person, about that time, spoon, sitting on the ground, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisig_story: Change . . . head. The key word has the sense of leaning on or toward someone or something.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: lean, incline, tilt, trend, wane, sink, ruin, bias
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: постное, наклон, угол наклона, направление, затухают, раковина, разруха, смещение
koohiiStory1: Mr. T gave a girl some change to lean over and give him head.
koohiiStory2: Leaning over changes the position of the head...　　　　　　　　　　RTK2:　ケイ　傾向　けいこう(tendency).
kunYomi: かたむ.く、かたむ.ける、かたぶ.く、かた.げる、かし.げる
jp_example_words:
傾く(かたぶく): to incline toward, to slant, to lurch, to heel over, to be disposed to, to trend toward, to be prone to, to go down (sun), to wane, to sink, to decline
傾ける(かたむける): to incline, to list, to bend, to lean, to tip, to tilt, to slant, to concentrate on, to ruin (a country), to squander, to empty
傾(けい): lean, incline
傾斜(けいしゃ): inclination, slant, slope, bevel, list, dip
傾く(かたむく): incline toward, slant, lurch, be disposed to, go down (sun), wane, sink, decline
傾向(けいこう): tendency, trend, inclination
傾らか(なだらか): gently-sloping, gentle, easy
jp_readingExamples: 傾く (かたむ.く), 傾ける (かたむ.ける)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You change this geoduck because you want it to lean. Right now it's standing up straight, but you want it to lean to one side instead.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Why do you want this geoduck to lean? Try to come up with your own reason. And why don't you look up what a geoduck looks like one more time for good measure. You don't want to be able to get this image out of your head.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: To get the geoduck to lean you put a piece of cake (けい) on one of its sides.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Watch as the geoduck slowly leans toward the cake, trying to get at it for a taste. But don't let it eat any! Keep putting the cake further and further away so the geoduck has to lean more.
Ru_Meaning: lean, incline, tilt, trend, wane, sink, ruin, bias
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), ハ, 匕 (ложка), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Ru_trainchinese:
qīng: (глаг) склоняться, наклоняться, гнуться
qīng: (графема) тенденция; рушиться, опрокидываться; выливать, опустошать; исчерпывать; (книжн.) превосходить
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you change (化) the page (頁) so it tilts
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T purchases 100 Chinese acres of land all on an incline because he loves to leave his house and ski down the incline and into town in the winter time.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " people " from " ha ", " are " also sound, the original meaning is oblique, oblique tilt. "Said Wen": "Zhe Ye. From the person to the hour, the sound is also the sound." "The Book of Rites-Under the Qu Li": "When you look at the face, you will be awkward, if you are down, you will be worried, and you will be treacherous." Zheng Xuan noted : "Looking away from the head, the heart is not correct." Kong Yingdashu: "Lean, sway."

" Tipping " can mean collapse or fall. Han Huan Tan "New Theory": "After the ages, the ancestral temple will not eat blood. The high platform has been poured, the pond has been leveled, the grave has thorns, and the fox den is in it."

" Turning " also means overturning and falling. "Poetry·Daya·Dang": "It used to be unwilling to listen, but to give in."

" Tilt " also means injury. "Mandarin ‧ Wu Yu": "The husband and the Wu people are separated, and the body is inclined. For example, a group of beasts, a negative arrow, will run a hundred groups, but the Wang Qi will have nowhere to take it." ."

" Inclination " can mean bias. Tang Dufu "From Beijing to Fengxian County, Five Hundred Chinese Characters": "Kuihuo pours into the sun, and physical properties are hard to seize."

" Pouring " also means pouring things out. "Han Feizi‧ Foreign Reserve Says Lower Right": "Today Jian Gong used the law to ban all of them for a long time, and Tian Chenghenglizhi was Tian Chengheng poured into the pond to show that the people were thirsty."

" Pouring " also refers to pouring. Song Wang Anshi "Nine Wells": "Mountains and rivers have collapsed due to reason, and hills and valleys have been vacant since ancient times. Who can keep this thousand years old, Tianzhu will not fall and spring often."

" Pour " also means exhaustion. Song Zenggong's "Private Policy, Reward and Punishment for the Army": "The counties and counties that are broken should be collected and rewarded for our soldiers."

" Pour " also means to pour out and talk. Song Wang Anshi, "Ji Zeng Zigu": "Gao Lun is almost a decay and vulgarity.

" Tipping " can mean overwhelming and surpassing. "Historical Records-The Biography of Wei Qi Wu'an Marquis": "Wu'an Hou Xin wanted to use things as his prime minister, humble his guests, and those who entered the celebrities' homes were more expensive.

" Inclination " also means overwhelming and rejection. "Old Tang Book-Dou Shen Biography": "There is a gap between Lu Zhi and Shen (Dou Shen).

" Inclination " can mean admiration and admiration. "Han Shu-Sima Xiangru Chuan 1": "Linqiong Ling did not dare to taste food, he greeted Xiangru himself, Xiangru had no choice but to force himself, sitting and leaning."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " people " from " ha ", " are " also sound, the original meaning is oblique, oblique tilt.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，從「頃」，「頃」亦聲，本義為斜、偏斜、傾斜。《說文》：「仄也。从人从頃，頃亦聲。」 《禮記‧曲禮下》：「凡視，上於面則敖，下於帶則憂，傾則姦。」鄭玄注：「闢頭旁視，心不正也。」孔穎達疏：「傾，欹側也。」

　　「傾」可表示倒塌、倒下。漢桓譚〈新論〉：「千秋萬歲之後，宗廟必不血食，高臺既已傾，曲池又已平，墳墓生荊棘，狐狸穴其中。」

　　「傾」也表示傾覆、覆亡。《詩‧大雅‧蕩》：「曾是莫聽，大命以傾。」

　　「傾」還表示損傷。《國語‧吳語》：「夫吳民離矣，體有所傾，譬如群獸然，一個負矢，將百群皆奔，王其無方收也。」韋昭注：「傾，傷也。」

　　「傾」可指偏向。唐杜甫〈自京赴奉先縣詠懷五百字〉：「葵藿傾太陽，物性固難奪。」

　　「傾」也指把東西倒出來。《韓非子‧外儲說右下》：「今簡公之以法禁其眾久矣，而田成恒利之，是田成恒傾圃池而示渴民也。」

　　「傾」還指傾瀉。宋王安石〈九井〉：「山川在理有崩竭，丘壑自古相虛盈。誰能保此千歲後，天柱不折泉常傾。」

　　「傾」亦表示竭盡。宋曾鞏《本朝政要策‧軍賞罰》：「所破郡縣，當傾帑藏，為朕賞戰士。」

　　「傾」還表示傾吐、傾訴。宋王安石〈寄曾子固〉：「高論幾為衰俗廢，壯懷難值故人傾。」

　　「傾」可表示壓倒、勝過。《史記‧魏其武安侯列傳》：「武安侯新欲用事為相，卑下賓客，進名士家居者貴之，欲以傾魏其諸將相。」

　　「傾」亦表示傾軋、排斥。《舊唐書‧竇申傳》：「兵部侍郎陸贄與參(竇參)有隙。

　　「傾」可指敬佩、欽慕。《漢書‧司馬相如傳上》：「臨邛令不敢嘗食，身自迎相如，相如為不得已而強往，一坐盡傾。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，從「頃」，「頃」亦聲，本義為斜、偏斜、傾斜。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
傾 (Simplified: 倾)
Pinyin: qīng
English Definition: to overturn; to collapse; to lean; to tend; to incline; to pour out
Total strokes: 13; Radical: 人
Pictophonetic: 頃 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 頃 [ qǐng ] a moment; a unit of area equal to 100 mu
Example Words:
傾向 [ qīng xiàng ]: trend; tendency; orientation
傾銷 [ qīng xiāo ]: to dump (goods, products)
傾聽 [ qīng tīng ]: to listen attentively
傾斜 [ qīng xié ]: to incline; to lean; to slant; to slope; to tilt
More: 傾* | *傾 | *傾*

傾傾RS
倾倾 		lean, incline, tilt, trend, wane, sink, ruin, bias
  • a person 亻 leaning 頃
(Simplified: 倾)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 頃 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 頃 [ qǐng ] a moment; a unit of area equal to 100 mu
①斜，歪：傾斜。傾側。傾塌。傾圮。傾跌。
②趨向：傾向。傾心。傾慕。傾注。左傾。右傾。
③倒塌：傾頹。傾覆。傾軋(在同一組織中互相排擠)。
④使器物反轉或歪斜以倒出裏面的東西；引申爲盡數拿出，毫無保留：傾箱倒篋(亦稱“傾筐倒庋”)。傾盆大雨。傾城。傾灑。傾銷。
⑤用盡(力量)：傾聽。傾訴。傾吐。
傾向 [ qīng xiàng ]: trend; tendency; orientation
傾銷 [ qīng xiāo ]: to dump (goods, products)
傾聽 [ qīng tīng ]: to listen attentively
傾斜 [ qīng xié ]: to incline; to lean; to slant; to slope; to tilt
(Simplified: 倾)

Pictophonetic: 頃 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.

從「 人 」，從「 頃 」，「 頃 」亦聲，本義為斜、偏斜、傾斜。《說文》：「仄也。从人从頃，頃亦聲。」 《禮記‧曲禮下》：「凡視，上於面則敖，下於帶則憂，傾則姦。」鄭玄注：「闢頭旁視，心不正也。」孔穎達疏：「傾，欹側也。」 「 傾 」可表示倒塌、倒下。漢桓譚〈新論〉：「千秋萬歲之後，宗廟必不血食，高臺既已傾，曲池又已平，墳墓生荊棘，狐狸穴其中。」 「 傾 」也表示傾覆、覆亡。《詩‧大雅‧蕩》：「曾是莫聽，大命以傾。」 「 傾 」還表示損傷。《國語‧吳語》：「夫吳民離矣，體有所傾，譬如群獸然，一個負矢，將百群皆奔，王其無方收也。」韋昭注：「傾，傷也。」 「 傾 」可指偏向。唐杜甫〈自京赴奉先縣詠懷五百字〉：「葵藿傾太陽，物性固難奪。」 「 傾 」也指把東西倒出來。《韓非子‧外儲說右下》：「今簡公之以法禁其眾久矣，而田成恒利之，是田成恒傾圃池而示渴民也。」 「 傾 」還指傾瀉。宋王安石〈九井〉：「山川在理有崩竭，丘壑自古相虛盈。誰能保此千歲後，天柱不折泉常傾。」 「 傾 」亦表示竭盡。宋曾鞏《本朝政要策‧軍賞罰》：「所破郡縣，當傾帑藏，為朕賞戰士。」 「 傾 」還表示傾吐、傾訴。宋王安石〈寄曾子固〉：「高論幾為衰俗廢，壯懷難值故人傾。」 「 傾 」可表示壓倒、勝過。《史記‧魏其武安侯列傳》：「武安侯新欲用事為相，卑下賓客，進名士家居者貴之，欲以傾魏其諸將相。」 「 傾 」亦表示傾軋、排斥。《舊唐書‧竇申傳》：「兵部侍郎陸贄與參(竇參)有隙。 「 傾 」可指敬佩、欽慕。《漢書‧司馬相如傳上》：「臨邛令不敢嘗食，身自迎相如，相如為不得已而強往，一坐盡傾。」

Seal characters (1)

傾字的基本解释

傾
qīng
见“倾”。

傾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qīng］
［《廣韻》去營切，平清，溪。］
“廎2”的被通假字。“倾1”的繁体字。
(1)斜；偏斜；倾斜。
(2)指倾向于，偏向。
(3)倒塌；倒下。
(4)指行为不正。
(5)倾覆；覆亡。
(6)损伤。
(7)死；丧。
(8)把东西倒出来。
(9)指倾泻。
(10)尽，竭尽。
(11)倾吐，倾诉。
(12)压倒；胜过。
(13)倾轧；排斥。
(14)害；坑害。
(15)敬佩；钦慕。
(16)指使敬佩，使钦慕。
(17)使顺从、归服。
(18)鎔铸。
[②]［qǐng］

傾字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傾； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页115第10
【唐韻】去營切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】窺營切，?音卿。【說文】側也。又伏也，敧也。【禮·曲禮】傾則姦。【註】視流則容側，必有不正之心存乎胷中，此君子所以愼也。　又圯也，空也。【淮南子·天文訓】天傾西北。　又西傾，山名。【書·禹貢】西傾因桓是來。　又通作頃。【詩·周南】不盈頃筐。　又【韻補】叶曲陽切，音匡。【黃庭經】羅列六腑生三光，心精意專內不傾，上合三焦下玉漿。

暂无。

[①]［qīng］
["Guangyun" went to Yingqie, Pingqing, Xi. ]
"廎2" was passed falsely. Traditional characters for "倾1".
(1) Oblique; skewed; oblique.
(2) Refers to inclinations and biases.
(3) Collapse; fall down.
(4) Refers to improper behavior.
(5) Overturned; overturned.
(6) Damage.
(7) Death; mourning.
(8) Pour out things.
(9) Refers to pouring.
(10) Exhaustion, exhaustion.
(11) Pour, talk.
(12) Overwhelming; surpassing.
(13) Tumble; repel.
(14) Harm; entrap.
(15) Admiration; admiration.
(16) Instruct admiration and admiration.
(17) Make obedience and submission.
(18) Casting.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [The Department of Human Characters] 　倾; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 115 No. 10
[Tang Yun] Go to Yingqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] See Yingqie,? Yinqing. [Said the text] Side also. It's also fuye, and shiye. [Li·Qu Li] If you want to go, you will be evil. [Note] When you look at the flow, you will be sideways, and there must be an unrighteous heart in your heart, so this gentleman is stunned.　圯也，空也。 [Huainanzi·Astronomy Training] The sky is tilted to the northwest.　 Westward, the name of the mountain. 【Book·Yugong】Western tilt is coming because of Huan.　It's all over again. [Poetry·Zhou Nan] Not full of baskets.　[Rhyme Supplement] Ye Quyang cuts, Yin Kuang. 【Huang Ting Jing】lists the six fu-organs to produce three lights, the heart is dedicated and does not tilt, the upper he triples the jade pulp and the lower the jade pulp.

Name meaning

qīng, qǐng
вм. 倾
Radicals: 化, 頁  (change, geoduck)
Meaning Mnemonic
You change this geoduck because you want it to lean. Right now it's standing up straight, but you want it to lean to one side instead.
Why do you want this geoduck to lean? Try to come up with your own reason. And why don't you look up what a geoduck looks like one more time for good measure. You don't want to be able to get this image out of your head.
Reading Mnemonic
To get the geoduck to lean you put a piece of cake (けい) on one of its sides.
Watch as the geoduck slowly leans toward the cake, trying to get at it for a taste. But don't let it eat any! Keep putting the cake further and further away so the geoduck has to lean more.
